snippet.title: Heroic Legend of Arslan - Mega CD - Longplay Part 1
snippet.description:
Many thanks to Bence Ladoczki (uneri2017 on Fiverr) for the translations for the text!  Please visit their personal site when you find the time: http://ldczk.com/ 

I apologize for the sound in this file.  Due to how I had to edit and combine the files, because the first round is entirely luck based, I wasn't able to properly align the music.  I promise it will be better in further videos.

This video includes the opening animations, and the first battle.
